sentences.sCn: 有同情心并关爱他人的人

sentences.sContent: I allowed him to go home on compassionate grounds .
sentences.sCn: 我出于同情让他回家了。

sentences.sContent: One measure of a civilized and compassionate society is how well it treats its prison population.
sentences.sCn: 衡量一个文明和有同情心的社会的尺度之一，就是看它如何对待囚犯。

words.tran: 同情地；慈悲地；富有同情心地

trans.tranOther: feeling sympathy for people who are suffering
